Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People on social media have been expressing their concern about the rising cost of living alongside low income levels. According to posts shared by various users affordable medicines are crucial for people on low incomes owing to the inflation rate and cost of living. Furthermore rental affordability is lacking particularly among people on Youth Allowance. Former RBA governor Bernie Fraser has echoed these concerns and is calling on the government to use its power for the betterment of the people. Meanwhile people are advocating for greater policy ambition and courage in the upcoming budget. Posts assert that if the cost of living continues to increase and wages stay the same workers will be at a disadvantage.
